channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 14th May
item.description:
28 day with give an take plus temporary footway closure needed footway abrupt level difference 900x100x25 mm concrete fillet required up to kerb line best out of hours stats required (FW6 Abrupt Level Differences)
Report on FixMyStreet
